title: What makes Justin Bieber lonely? - Quora

response.answer_text: Money and fame at a young age never makes anyone happy. People know everything about you even if you don’t wish to tell them anything. You don’t have a personal life. You start making distance from people, and trusting anyone becomes very difficult. JB got it all and that’s why he was left alone. Nevertheless, he does a lot of great work and is seeming happy to me nowadays. Hailey Bieber, his wife, has really helped him to cope through depression but again internal struggles are very personal. so yeah, that’s why JB feels lonely. god bless :)
